title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.5 - Permit to negotiate with wholesaler for an operating agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.5 - Permit to negotiate with wholesaler for an operating agency

State Regulations

An application by an out-of-state manufacturer or
wholesaler for a permit to negotiate a contract with one or more licensed
wholesalers to establish one or more operating agency relationships for the
sale of its products in this State must be accompanied by: (a) A photostat of the license to manufacture
or sell alcoholic beverages at wholesale issued to the applicant by the
licensing body in the state in which it is located, or if applicant is located
in a foreign country, a certificate or letter from the consul or other
governmental representative certifying that such applicant is licensed to
manufacture or sell alcoholic beverages at wholesale in such foreign
country. (b) If the application is
executed by an authorized representative, a letter from the out-of-state
licensee specifically authorizing such representative to negotiate and
consummate one or more agreements with a licensed wholesaler or wholesalers for
the establishment of an agency in this State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
33.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
